item.title: Key Management Service
item.description: About AWS Key Management Service (KMS) makes it easy for you to create and manage cryptographic keys and control their use across a wide range of AWS services and in your applications. Documentation User Guide AWS KMS provides management of encryption keys for use with other AWS services (e.g. EBS, S3, RDS, etc.). Key management on AWS is a broad range of activities from creating & storing public & private keys to creating, managing, and authorising access to AWS services with digital keys.
